author: Michael Moore
method: Cook the sausages until brown and leave to rest Then place the cream in a pan and leave to simmer. Next add the garlic, cheese, Grappa and parsley.  Season to taste and serve in a fondue pot.  Dunk the sausages and bread in the cheese.
ingredients: 2 Bratwurst or Lincolnshire sausages,  bread for dunking,  200g/7¼oz cheddar cheese, grated,  ½ litre double cream ,  80ml/2¾fl oz Grappa,  30g/1¾oz chopped fresh parsley,  1 clove garlic
